title: President Donald J. Trump Has Made it a Priority to Combat the Heinous Crime of Human Trafficking â€“ The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Law & Justice	

Issued on:
October 29, 2019
My Administration is committed to leveraging every resource we have to confront this threat, to support the victims and survivors, and to hold traffickers accountable for their heinous crimes.
						President Donald J. Trump					ERADICATING HUMAN TRAFFICKING: President Trump has made it a priority to leverage every resource of the Federal Government to end the scourge of human trafficking. FIGHTING TRAFFICKING ON ALL FRONTS: The Administration is committed to thwarting all forms of human trafficking within the United States, at our border, and internationally. PROTECTING VICTIMS: The Administration is working aggressively to protect and assist every survivor of human trafficking.
